sentence.idiomatic: How is your new employee? He's really not bad. He's very capable and is eager to advance.
As I see it, every person should have a desire to make progress.
I don't like him because he has no ambition.
Are you willing to come attend our party? I'd love to.
Mr. Li is not willing to work hard because he doesn't like his job.
Is Ms. Wang willing to spend time on learning French? She's willing, because she wants to study abroad in France.
Where will you work in the future? In the future I'll work in Hong Kong.
It's difficult for anyone to know what is going to happen in the future.
Three years after leaving Hong Kong, he returned to Hong Kong.
Ms. Wang's goal for this year is to find a good job.
I don't do this job for the money. I'm only doing it with the aim of gaining experience.
What plans do you have in studying Chinese? My goal is to be able to use Chinese to travel around China within one year.
This dog is also one of our family members.
Contacting clients is one responsibility of this job.
Earning money is one of my goals in this job, but it's not the only goal.
Ms. Li's family is in the pharmaceuticals business.
What does Mr. Wang do? He does business.
Mr. Zhang no longer does business because he found that he doesn't have what it takes.
Last year they established their own company. Now it's going really well.
This school was founded in 1954.
The company established a special team to solve this difficult problem.
What plans do you have for the future? I plan to go to the United States to work.
Mrs. Wang's plan to immigrate to France is not very realistic.
Mr. Li doesn't plan to spend that much money to buy this car.
This car is an American export to China.
Where did you import clothing into China from?
What do they export from China to Japan?
I wish you success!
Mr. Li is a successful businessman.

word.literal: give something and get something in return

sentence.idiomatic: His successes are his return on his hard work.
I’m ambitious and I'm willing to work hard in the future.
One of my goals is to go to China to do business.
I want to set up my own company.
I plan to export clothes from China to America.
If I work hard, I think I will be successful.
